thread.title: Joanne

author: Joanne
title: Joanne
text: I live in New England and received my order in mid March. This is way to early for planting. If you also live in New England ask for a fall shipment. I really do love their trees and the ones we bought are wonderful.. the only problem I have is that the ground is frozen and has 12-14 inches of snow on it right now. I really do,hope I can keep them viable long enough to get them planted.
